page.title: 08Interesting People 2
page.content: Abbot John Islip.Probably born in Islip.Built Henry VII's Chapel in Westmister Abbey. Dr Robert South,Dean of Westminster and Rector of Islip.Islip's greatest benefactor.Re-built the church chancel burnt down in the battle of 1645.Built the Old Rectory about 1695.Built and endowed the School, which still bears his name,in 1710.The original school building is now a private house.Died in 1712 and is buried at the foot of the main altar in Westminster Abbey. Anthony Burton,industrial archaeologist,author and television presenter (The Past at Work,The Past Afloat etc) lived in Islip in 1970 -80. Jonathan Kingdon,artist,naturalist, author of volumes on animal behaviour,and television presenter is living in Islip now (1985).
